abstract: Clear Channel, the media giant that owns 850 radio stations, has made an exclusive deal with LivingSocial to offer its discount offerings on 500 of its stations.
snippet: Clear Channel, the media giant that owns 850 radio stations, has made an exclusive deal with LivingSocial to offer its discount offerings on 500 of its stations.
lead_paragraph: Daily deals are coming to the radio.

headline.main: Clear Channel Strikes Deal With LivingSocial
